Section 4 of the Minimum Wage Act Revision Act of 1992, effective March 25,

c.t: § 3. Nothing in this act shall be construed as preventing the Council of the District of Columbia from increasing minimum wages or benefits to levels in excess of those provided for in this act for any category of employees.
